page.title: 07Nettlebed Health Centre
page.content: The health centre has 3 doctors one district nurse,one health visitor,one full time nurse,one cleaner and 4 office staff. They have over 3 500 patients who come from Henley, Nettlebed, Watlington, Bix, Stoke Row and Turville.The working hours are 8.30am to 6.00pm. One year ago the Health centre was changed round and rebuilt but it stayed open.The Health centre used to be at the old doctors house.It has its own dispensary because the nearest one is about a mile away. There is a baby clinic and a verucca clinic.
